attributes.action: Give equal rights of citizenship to ALL Hong Kong residents not just BNOs
attributes.additional_details: Its a very unfair policy that the UK government have left out many Hong Kong non bno nationals who are in more danger and have more reasons to be persecuted. They are people to however it seems they are being discriminated to some extent because they dont have BNO status. Home Office should change their agenda and give citizenship rights all Hong Kong nationals not just BNOs
attributes.background: There are many Hong Kong nationals who dont have a BNO passport and cannot take advantage of safety/refuge from the new security laws. Home office have a right to offer equal citizenship rights to all vaild Hong Kong residents and not discriminate over a status or deadline.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323543
